items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
items.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Backend: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). items.content_html: See, Understand, Execute — A lightweight, AI-powered desktop automation system built with Node.js. Pierre enables intelligent control of your computer through natural language, offering both local and remote operation capabilities.
items.title: antoinekm/pierre: See, Understand, Execute — A lightweight, AI-powered desktop automation system built with Node.js. Pierre enables intelligent control of your computer through natural language, offering both local and remote operation capabilities.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: oauth-fetch is a lightweight, flexible HTTP client built on top of the native fetch API to simplify making requests to both public and OAuth-protected resources.
items.title: jacobovidal/oauth-fetch: oauth-fetch is a lightweight, flexible HTTP client built on top of the native fetch API to simplify making requests to both public and OAuth-protected resources.

items.content_html: FlatHier is a lightweight node.js library to create and manipulate hierarchical data stored in a flat json.
items.title: terzitech/flathier: FlatHier is a lightweight node.js library to create and manipulate hierarchical data stored in a flat json.

items.content_html: 💡 A lightweight Chrome extension that lets you search for words within a video, summarizes the overall transcript, and auto-searches clusters related to the given input word.
items.title: jorjishasan/video-word-search: 💡 A lightweight Chrome extension that lets you search for words within a video, summarizes the overall transcript, and auto-searches clusters related to the given input word.

items.content_html: Open-source web app for managing CSRs and issuing X.509 certificates in a small PKI. Built with Node.js, React, and PostgreSQL, it offers user/admin dashboards, secure authentication, and email notifications. Perfect for lightweight PKI setups.
items.title: imabhi7/Local-Certificate-Authority-Service: Open-source web app for managing CSRs and issuing X.509 certificates in a small PKI. Built with Node.js, React, and PostgreSQL, it offers user/admin dashboards, secure authentication, and email notifications. Perfect for lightweight PKI setups.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...

items.title: inversify/monorepo: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

items.content_html: This project features a lightweight and visually appealing canvas animation built with JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas API. It’s ideal for use as a website background, loading screen, or a creative visual element to enhance UI/UX.
items.title: hayk-arevshatyan/canvas-animation-1: This project features a lightweight and visually appealing canvas animation built with JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas API. It’s ideal for use as a website background, loading screen, or a creative visual element to enhance UI/UX.

items.content_html: BiolockEmbed is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed to simplify the integration of your BioLock iframe into a parent website. With an intuitive API, it streamlines the communication between the iframe and your web application while offering extensive customization options.
items.title: Bio-lock/BiolockEmbed: BiolockEmbed is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed to simplify the integration of your BioLock iframe into a parent website. With an intuitive API, it streamlines the communication between the iframe and your web application while offering extensive customization options.
